scrum noun
(IN BUSINESS)
[ U ]
  business
  specialized a method used when developing a new product in which a team is allowed to organize itself and make changes quickly as they are needed. It also involves having short meetings every day.
[ C ]
  business
  specialized a short meeting held every day between the members of a team who are developing a new product
